mogu

‘mogu’ is onomatopoeia in Japanese which is like yum yum yum…
Foodies blog site across Vancouver and all of the world. I have strong passion about food, this is parts of my life to eat delicious food. This blog was used simple structure of WordPress though, I learned many things how to get the data or how to show the data.

#Web Design #Web Development

WordPress, HTML, SCSS, JavaScript, XD, Photoshop

Feb. 2019

Visit Website

Colors

Theme color

The Color of RED which is contain both of flags Canada and Japan. Expressed much of passion about food.

This is a website which is a blog, and it should be easy to read an article. In order to that, I assigned a simple design that background color is white and the font is black. The theme color of red is also an accent color to this website.

#B4061F

- Header

- Header for mobile device

- Icons

Fonts

Base - Source Han Sans JP

Chose it from the readability of both alphabet and Japanese. Even if I combine those fonts(alphabets and Japanese), it won't collapse each other. The text keeps the same height.

Light

Regular

Logo - Caramel Macchiato Bouncy

Wanted to choose some font which is related to FOOD. This font "Caramel Macchiato Bouncy" as a logo to represent the bouncy of ones heart when eating.

- Title

- Contents

- Heading

- Author description

- Logo

Layout

Changed the thumbnail layout of the top page and category page to change the appearance. The top page has two columns so that all articles can be viewed in a list, and the category page has one column so that new articles from above can be easily understood.
